page.title: 11Waterworks in Pennington
page.content: The water pipes in the Pennington area are very old and are made of cast iron.Gravel,dirt and rust are swept down together and start to block up the pipes.This gives us discoloured water and not enough pressure.If new pipes are put in,it will mean digging up the roads and this will cause traffic jams and it will cost a lot of money. In May the workmen decided to clean the pipes.This meant digging up the road only at regular intervals.Then they lined the pipes with cement which will keep the rust from blocking the pipes and will strengthen them.After treatment,we have safe,clean water and a much better water pressure.
